children.value: We will use an intake-ESM catalog hosted on NCAR’s Research Data Archive. This is nothing but the AWS cmip6 catalog modified to use OSDF

# Load catalog URL
rda_url     =  'https://data.rda.ucar.edu/'
cat_url     = rda_url +  'd850001/catalogs/osdf/cmip6-aws/cmip6-osdf-zarr.json'
print(cat_url)
Set up local dask cluster and load data

children.label: Set up local dask cluster and load data

children.value: Before we do any computation let us first set up a local cluster using dask

cluster = LocalCluster()          
client = cluster.get_client()
cluster.scale(2)
cluster
